Work
About

Work

Coinbase Design System

Mar 2020 to Today

I'm currently working on the design system that grew out of the react native rewrite. It is slowly becoming a larger system that emcompasses all products and platforms at Coinbase.

Coinbase mobile rewrite

Jan 2020 to Today

For six months, I PM'ed the react native rewrite of the Coinbase Android app. We also used this opportunity to greenfield a new design system, which later became my whole focus.

Coinbase core product

Mar 2018 to Jan 2020

I worked on the consumer core product team at Coinbase, and its predecessor team before that. During my two years there, our team was focused on trading, engagement, and architecture – which meant we got to work on almost every feature in the logged in experience.

Autoflow

Sep 2019 to Today

Autoflow is a figma plugin that makes it easy to draw flows. Select 2 shapes while the plugin is running, and a line will connect them automatically. David and I worked with the beta Figma API and were subsequently featured at the Figma plugins launch event.

Goodweb.design

Aug 2017 to Today

Goodweb.design curates, tags and sorts well-designed landing pages. Our aim is to help designers, marketers, and product builders of all stripes learn from best web design practices.

Google Grasshopper

Oct 2016 to Mar 2018

Grasshopper is the code learning app for everyone. Our studio worked with the team for 11 months to design a complete mobile coding environment from the ground up. The project is currently in beta.

Google Soli

Jan 2018 to Mar 2018

Project Soli is developing a new interaction sensor using radar technology. I worked with the team to demonstrate use cases for the chip. My work is super crazy NDA, so here are some public explainer videos.

Google Skybound

Jun 2017 to Sep 2017

Skybound is building tools for the drone industry. We helped the team design their MVP web product. Then we worked them to paint the vision of future features.

Hemingly

May 2014 to Dec 2015

Hemingly was a startup I co-founded to help companies get their paperwork done quickly and cheaply. We built a hiring, training and distribution system to manage a global workforce.

Stay up to date by subscribing via RSS. Don't already use it? I recommend starting with Feedly. You can also treat yourself a little by getting Reeder. Find me elsewhere on Twitter, Github, and Linkedin.
